verses.roman:
bhoga sarile jagannāthera sevaka-gaṇa
prasāda lañā prabhu-ṭhāñi kaila āgamana

synonyms: bhoga sarile—when the food was taken away; jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; sevaka-gaṇa—the servants; prasāda lañā—taking the prasāda; prabhu-ṭhāñi—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kaila āgamana—came.
translation: When the ārati finished, the prasāda was taken out, and the servants of Lord Jagannātha came to offer some to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
